Object Shape: Bullet, Missile, Circle, Cylinder, Flash, Star-like, Triangle
Summary: in 2007, saw 3 triagularcraft at treetop level, near old town. nearly everyday for last 2.5 yrs. was flashed 17x in one sighting.
trends: There have been 129 other sightings in Albuquerque
There were no other sightings in Albuquerque on or around November 10th 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsI believe I've been seeing UFOs since childhood, in Santa Fe, NMm. The star The star However, in 2007, I saw three white trianglar craft hovering, silent, for approx 10 min. Then in 2008, I saw in my head, while fully awake, the face of an aliens head, lasted approx 2-6 sec. And has never again occurred. In 2010, I began seeing flashes of light near the star of Orion in November of 2010. It started with on flash, then 17 in one sighting. I would get flashed atleast 2-4x a night, always around 4:40-6 a.m. this has been going for quite sometime. I have moved, worked in different parts of the city, and I feel its followed me. I put myself in a grid-like map, so to speak, and they are always there nearby. I even saw the same lights in Santa Fe this summer, so in a different city, its there. The flashing has lessoned, but not the visual sightings, like a star. They let me see them, then dim out as they make their way through the sky. I would really. Cate .to speak someone. Thank u.
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
